shortContent:
The fear of
it always has an associated rating (1-4) to reflect just how awful
the creature is to behold. See page 277 for the effects of Fear on
Space Marines.
content:
A creature with this trait has an unnerving appearance. The fear of
it always has an associated rating (1-4) to reflect just how awful
the creature is to behold. See page 277 for the effects of Fear on
Space Marines.
